body_html:
can you try sess = tf.Session(config=tf.ConfigProto(intra_op_parallelism_threads=1))
If it still hangs, maybe you could compile in debug mode, attach GDB to hanging process and do "bt" to see where it's stuck

body:
can you try sess = tf.Session(config=tf.ConfigProto(intra_op_parallelism_threads=1))
If it still hangs, maybe you could compile in debug mode, attach GDB to hanging process and do "bt" to see where it's stuck
